thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
The Next Deadline
Another week and another potential government shutdown looms. Today, a bipartisan pair of senators will introduce an immigration bill that will try to break the budget-immigration deadlock. The plan avoids the more contentious requests on immigration sought by President Trump. Coming ahead of another government-funding deadline of 12:01 a.m. Friday, the proposal is an effort to move toward a narrower agreement on immigration as well as allow for the completion of a long-term budget deal, which...
